Plot basic charts using W&B.

{% raw %}

plot_basic_charts[source]

plot_basic_charts(chart_type:str='line', x_data:str=None, y_data:str=None, x_name:str=None, y_name:str=None, chart_title:str=None, wandb_chart_name:str='basic-chart')

Plot basic W&B charts.

Examples

Plot a simple line chart plot_basic_charts(chart_type='line', x_data=[1,2,3,4,5], y_data=[1,2,3,4,5], x_name="x", y_name="y", chart_title="Simple line chart")

Plot a simple bar chart plot_basic_charts(chart_type='bar', x_data=['a','b','c','d','e'], y_data=[1,2,3,4,5], x_name="x", y_name="y", chart_title="Simple bar chart")

Note: When plotting a bar chart, x_data is the labels while y_data is the values.

Plot a simple scatter chart plot_basic_charts(chart_type='scatter', x_data=[1,2,3,4,5], y_data=[1,2,3,4,5], x_name="x", y_name="y", chart_title="Simple scatter chart")

Parameters:

  • chart_type : <class 'str'>, optional

    Choose a basic chart type to plot, 'line', 'bar', 'scatter' (default:'line')

  • x_data : <class 'str'>, optional

    x-axis data

  • y_data : <class 'str'>, optional

    y-axis data.

  • x_name : <class 'str'>, optional

    x-axis name.

  • y_name : <class 'str'>, optional

    y-axis name.

  • chart_title : <class 'str'>, optional

    Chart title.

  • wandb_chart_name : <class 'str'>, optional

    Chart name.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# y_values = [1,2,3,4,5]

# run = wandb.init(entity='ayush-thakur', project='tests')
# plot_basic_charts(chart_type='bar', x_data=x_values, y_data=y_values, x_name="x", y_name="y", chart_title="Simple scatter chart")
# run.finish()
{% endraw %}

Log Images to W&B

{% raw %}

log_images[source]

log_images(images:list, log_as_sequence:bool=False)

Log images to wandb. You can pass in list of images as ndarray, PIL Image, or filepath.

Examples

Log images as sequence log_images(images=["image1.png", "image2.png"], log_as_sequence=True) log_images(images=[image1, image2], log_as_sequence=True)

Log images as grid log_images(images=["image1.png", "image2.png", "image3.png"], log_as_sequence=False) log_images(images=[image1.png, image2.png, image3], log_as_sequence=False)

Parameters:

  • images : <class 'list'>

    List of image array/PIL Images or image files to log.

  • log_as_sequence : <class 'bool'>, optional
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# log_images(images=["data/images/blackhole.jpg", "data/images/moon.jpg"])
# run.finish()
{% endraw %}
